# Create Bulk Download Job Using SOQL

# Description

Execute an SOQL query asynchronously to retrieve a CSV file of records.

# Project compatibility

Windows | Cross-platform

# Configuration

* 
* Query - Provide the SOQL query to retrieve the actual records in the CSV file. For example: Select Fields(All) from Account Where Name='Sandy' AND MailingState='California'.





* Job ID - ID of the query job. Automatically generated output variable.
